CustomField.formula:
IF(TotalBookings__c >= TotalRevenueNet__c, IF(IsKeyAccount__c,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/red.png", "KAM",41,32) ,IF(AND(TotalBookings__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect'))), "Prospect", IF(AND(TotalBookings__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect')), "", IF(TotalBookings__c < 20000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/bronze.png", "Bronze",41,32) , IF(TotalBookings__c < 40000 ,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/silver.png", "Silver",41,32) , IF(TotalBookings__c < 80000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/gold.png", "Gold",41,32) , IF(TotalBookings__c > 80000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/black.png", "Platinum",41,32) ,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/bronze.png", "Bronze",41,32) ))))))),
IF(IsKeyAccount__c,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/red.png", "KAM",41,32),IF(AND(TotalRevenueNet__c = 0,NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect'))), "Prospect", IF(AND(TotalRevenueNet__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Lost Prospect')), "", IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 20000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/bronze.png", "Bronze",41,32) , IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 40000 ,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/silver.png", "Silver",41,32), IF(TotalRevenueNet__c < 80000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/gold.png", "Gold",41,32) , IF(TotalRevenueNet__c > 80000, IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/black.png", "Platinum",41,32) ,IMAGE("/resource/AccountTiers/bronze.png", "Bronze",41,32) ))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tiers based on bookings or total net revenue (if higher) 0k = Prospect <20k = Bronze (bronze) <40 = Silver (silver) <80k = Gold (gold) >80k = Platinum (black) Key Account = KAM (red)
CustomField.label: Tier
